video.title: Jessie
video.synopsis: Texas teen Jessie moves to the Big Apple to follow her dreams, and finds a job as a nanny for a high-profile family with four high-energy children.

episodes.synopsis: Jessie goes to New York City to follow her dreams and suddenly finds herself as a nanny.
episodes.title: New York, New Nanny

episodes.synopsis: Ravi must get rid of his lizard because it's not allowed in the building.
episodes.title: The Talented Mr. Kipling

episodes.synopsis: Ravi is fed up with Luke and Zuri's pranks.
episodes.title: Used Karma

episodes.synopsis: Luke tries to recruit a member of the family for a paintball tourney.
episodes.title: Zombie Tea Party 5

episodes.synopsis: Jessie plays her guitar in Central Park, preparing for an open mic night.
episodes.title: One Day Wonders

episodes.synopsis: Imaginary friends can keep a child from developing real friendships.
episodes.title: Zuri's New Old Friend

episodes.synopsis: Jessie doesn't know that Luke's study date has an obsessive crush on him.
episodes.title: Creepy Connie Comes a Callin'

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and Bertram work together to finish all the Christmas preparations.
episodes.title: Christmas Story

episodes.synopsis: Morgan asks a teen heartthrob to stay with the Ross family.
episodes.title: Star Wars

episodes.synopsis: Ravi begins attending Luke's school, Luke worries that Ravi will ruin his rep.
episodes.title: Are You Cooler Than a 5th Grader?

episodes.synopsis: Jessie takes the kids for a trip on the subway.
episodes.title: Take the A-Train ... I Think?

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and Zuri sneak into Mrs. Chesterfield's apartment.
episodes.title: Romancing the Crone

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and Zuri read a bedtime story that places the gang in medieval times.
episodes.title: The Princess and the Pea Brain

episodes.synopsis: Jessie is bullied by a bossy nanny and ends up on her website.
episodes.title: World Wide Web of Lies

episodes.synopsis: Jessie asks another nanny for advice.
episodes.title: The Kid Whisperer

episodes.synopsis: Ms. Chesterfield accuses the Ross kids of switching her shampoo with glue.
episodes.title: Glue Dunnit: A Sticky Situation

episodes.synopsis: Jessie doesn't approve of a boy Emma likes because of his bad reputation.
episodes.title: Badfellas

episodes.synopsis: Zuri enters the Little Miss Big Apple pageant.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Beasts

episodes.synopsis: Agatha's twin sister, Angela, visits and Jessie lets her stay at the Ross house.
episodes.title: Evil Times Two

episodes.synopsis: Emma and Zuri help Jessie prepare for a date, while Ravi, Luke and Bertram get stuck on a billboard.
episodes.title: Tempest in a Teacup

episodes.synopsis: Zuri refuses to sleep in her room.
episodes.title: A Doll's Outhouse

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and the kids set off to meet their parents in a private jet.
episodes.title: We Are So Grounded

episodes.synopsis: Jessie directs a play she's written at the kids' school.
episodes.title: Creepy Connie's Curtain Call

episodes.synopsis: Jessie decides she wants to try acting and plans on auditioning for a TV show.
episodes.title: Cattle Calls & Scary Walls

episodes.synopsis: Its Zuri's "Gotcha Day," and Jessie is in charge of getting Zuri's party ready, but she's worried that Zuri won't like the decorations she picked out.
episodes.title: Gotcha Day

episodes.synopsis: Ravi is worried about Mr. Kipling, but he quickly learns Mr Kipling is actually Mrs. Kipling and has laid eggs.
episodes.title: The Secret Life of Mr. Kipling

episodes.synopsis: The kids learn the legend of the nanny who did "something terrible" to her charges on Halloween.
episodes.title: The Whining

episodes.synopsis: Jessie becomes concerned about Tony's jealousy issues.
episodes.title: Green-Eyed Monster

episodes.synopsis: On Emma's first day of high school, she meets a tough transfer student named Rosie.
episodes.title: Make New Friends But Hide the Old

episodes.synopsis: Ravi decides he wants to find good parents to adopt Ms. Kipling's babies.
episodes.title: 101 Lizards

episodes.synopsis: Emma is excited that Christina is planning a fashion show to showcase her mom's new fashion line.
episodes.title: Trashin' Fashion

episodes.synopsis: Jessie offers to let Austin, Ally, Trish and Dez crash at the penthouse.
episodes.title: Austin & Jessie & Ally All Star New Year: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jessie is concerned that Tony has become controlling, clingy and insecure in their relationship.
episodes.title: Trouble with Tessie

episodes.synopsis: When NBA player Chris Bosh needs somewhere to stay, Jessie volunteers the penthouse.
episodes.title: Say Yes to the Messy Dress

episodes.synopsis: When Zuri is having problems with a teacher, Jessie decides to volunteer in Zuri's classroom.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pest

episodes.synopsis: Jessie gets her big break as a stunt double to an Australian actress in a big budget action movie.
episodes.title: Jessie's Big Break: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Jessie gets her big break, chaos ensues when the movie's director and Shaylee's boyfriend, MCD, asks Jessie out on a date.
episodes.title: Jessie's Big Break: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Luke shows Jessie some dance moves but he trips and hurts his knee.
episodes.title: Pain in the Rear Window

episodes.synopsis: When Jessie passes on a cherished toy to Zuri, Zuri trades it with a toy collector.
episodes.title: Toy Con

episodes.synopsis: When Jessie and Zuri switch personalities, Zuri must pull off Jessie's first big acting part.
episodes.title: To Be Me Or Not to Be Me

episodes.synopsis: Jessie's anniversary gift to Tony is writing a song about how much he means to her.
episodes.title: Why Do Foils Fall in Love?

episodes.synopsis: Emma becomes paranoid when Jessie tells her she thinks a new girl is trying to steal her friends.
episodes.title: Kids Don't Wanna Be Shunned

episodes.synopsis: When Jessie discovers Zuri is a chess prodigy, she encourages her to compete competitively.
episodes.title: All The Knight Moves

episodes.synopsis: Jessie wants to prove that she is a great girl scout leader by helping Zuri earn her badges.
episodes.title: We Don't Need No Stinkin' Badges

episodes.synopsis: Jessie agrees to let Zuri bring her classroom pet bunny home with her to stay.
episodes.title: Somebunny's in Trouble

episodes.synopsis: Jessie punishes Emma by not letting her go to the school dance.
episodes.title: Punch Dumped Love

episodes.synopsis: Luke decides, with Jessie's guidance, that it's time to cut the strings between him and Kenny.
episodes.title: Quitting Cold Koala

episodes.synopsis: Everyone gets trapped in the penthouse panic room.
episodes.title: Panic Attack Room

episodes.synopsis: For Bertram's birthday, Jessie surprises him by inviting his mother to stay.
episodes.title: Throw Momma From The Terrace

episodes.synopsis: Future Jessie appears from an elevator time machine to warn current Jessie.
episodes.title: The Jessie-Nator: Grudgement Day

episodes.synopsis: Things become tense when Bryn joins the morning announcements and co-anchors with Emma and Luke.
episodes.title: Diary of a Mad Newswoman

episodes.synopsis: Jessie feels threatened when Tony has to train a beautiful girl named Victoria as a doorman.
episodes.title: Break-Up and Shape-Up

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and the kids travel to her dad's military base in Texas.
episodes.title: G.I. Jessie: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Jessie finds out that her dad is getting married.
episodes.title: G.I. Jessie: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Left out of Mrs. Chesterfield's rooftop Halloween party, Jessie and the kids throw their own bash -- and get some unexpected ghostly guests.
episodes.title: Ghost Bummers

episodes.synopsis: Jessie signs with a talent agency that only represents hand models, and Jessie's contribution to the bake sale turns into a rooftop fundraising party.
episodes.title: Caught Purple Handed

episodes.synopsis: Jessie is chosen to understudy for a big star in an off-Broadway play, and Ravi and Luke plot to make sure she gets a chance to take the stage.
episodes.title: Understudied and Overdone

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and Tony get their wires crossed when they set each other up on dates. Meanwhile, Luke causes mayhem at the zoo, threatening Ravi's internship.
episodes.title: The Blind Date, The Cheapskate and the Primate

episodes.synopsis: Emma helps Luke find his birth mother, who turns out to be a wrestler. Meanwhile, Ravi campaigns for president of the school reptile club.
episodes.title: Lizard Scales and Wrestling Tales

episodes.synopsis: Jessie accepts on everyone's behalf when a producer offers them a reality show, and the kids find their words used against them in the editing room.
episodes.title: The Rosses Get Real

episodes.synopsis: Jessie meets Teddy Duncan and her brother PJ in this special holiday crossover episode with "Good Luck Charlie."
episodes.title: Good Luck Jessie: NYC Christmas: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jessie soon regrets her decision to sign Luke up for dance classes when his teacher tells him to put dance before his schoolwork.
episodes.title: Krumping and Crushing

episodes.synopsis: Farm girl and recent lottery winner Maybelle moves into the Fairfield, where she catches the eye of Emma's new boyfriend, Rick.
episodes.title: Hoedown Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Jessie introduces Zuri to a new friend, Wendy, who's an absolute terror to be around. Meanwhile, Emma is forced to get a job.
episodes.title: Snack Attack

episodes.synopsis: Creepy Connie's back and intent on causing havoc for Luke. Meanwhile, Emma plays hooky from work, with disastrous results.
episodes.title: Creepy Connie 3: The Creepening

episodes.synopsis: Jessie's new drama class friend, Abbey, turns out to be anything but friendly, as she causes the Ross kids to take sides and steals Jessie's ideas.
episodes.title: Acting with the Frenemy

episodes.synopsis: Jessie bonds with Zuri's new friend Taylor, a fellow military kid, and ends up arranging a very special birthday surprise for her.
episodes.title: From the White House to Our House

episodes.synopsis: In need of some extra money to buy her dad a birthday present, Jessie gets a job at the Empire Skate Building, not realizing that Emma is her boss.
episodes.title: Help Not Wanted

episodes.synopsis: Zuri and Stuart run away when Jessie gets into a fight with Stuart's "manny," and Ravi practices for the upcoming talent show.
episodes.title: Where's Zuri?

episodes.synopsis: A stressed-out Jessie tries to help each of the kids prepare for school on a particularly disorganized morning.
episodes.title: Morning Rush

episodes.synopsis: Unable to find acting jobs, Jessie sets out to enter her own movie in a film festival. But getting the kids to help is her first mistake.
episodes.title: Lights, Camera, Distraction!

episodes.synopsis: Ravi gets the birthday trip of a lifetime from Christina and Morgan: a trip to outer space! But what will happen when he's left behind?
episodes.title: Spaced Out

episodes.synopsis: Jessie accompanies Bertram to his high school reunion, and Ravi steals a video game Jessie doesn't want him to have.
episodes.title: The Telltale Duck

episodes.synopsis: Emma, Ravi and Zuri compete for the chance to join Jessie at the Justin Timberlake concert, and Bertram and Luke fight over a talking coffee maker.
episodes.title: Coffee Talk

episodes.synopsis: Jessie finds herself falling for Brooks, but Mrs. Chesterfield isn't sure they're right for each other. Meanwhile, Bertram baby-sits Zeus.
episodes.title: Between the Swoon and New York City

episodes.synopsis: Mrs. Chesterfield hires Bertram to find something on Jessie that will lead Brooks to break up with her. Meanwhile, Tony still has feelings for Jessie.
episodes.title: No Money, Mo' Problems

episodes.synopsis: The Ross kids' preparations for Halloween are interrupted by the news that Brooks has proposed to Jessie.
episodes.title: The Runaway Bride of Frankenstein

episodes.synopsis: Jessie and Brooks's wedding plans are unexpectedly turned upside down when he gets a job offer -- in Africa.
episodes.title: There Goes the Bride

episodes.synopsis: Jessie needs to get to an important audition but she and Ravi wind up as contestants on a game show during their taxi ride.
episodes.title: Ride To Riches

episodes.synopsis: Jessie gets a role on a TV show that shoots in Hawaii so she and the kids spend Christmas in their family villa.
episodes.title: Jessie's Aloha Holidays with Parker and Joey: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The kids try to cheer up Jessie after she loses her TV role to her friend Shaylee.
episodes.title: Jessie's Aloha Holidays with Parker and Joey: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Thinking that Jessie has gone to Africa, the kids hop on a plane to get her back. Ravi and Luke argue whether athleticism or brains is more important.
episodes.title: But Africa Is So...Fari

episodes.synopsis: When her sister Darla shows up, Jessie tries to hide the fact that she called off her wedding. Luke tries to shave for the first time.
episodes.title: A Close Shave

episodes.synopsis: The Ross family faces upheaval when Christina and Morgan announce that they've lost all their money.
episodes.title: Four Broke Kids

episodes.synopsis: When Jessie goes back to college, she and Ravi end up in the same class. Zuri comes home from Africa with a baby giraffe. Emma plays a prank on Luke.
episodes.title: Moby and SCOBY

episodes.synopsis: When a rebellious Emma is suspended from school, she runs away from home. Zuri practices for her karate test, with Luke acting as her sensei.
episodes.title: Karate Kid-tastrophe

episodes.synopsis: Jessie is forced to partner with Hudson on a school project. Ravi gets professional help from Chris Paul when he wants to join Luke's basketball team.
episodes.title: Basket Case

episodes.synopsis: When the kids are snowed in at the penthouse, an epic game of capture the flag tests allegiances, prompts trickery and pushes everyone a bit too far.
episodes.title: Capture the Nag

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to help Ravi make friends, Jessie takes him to a MENSA meeting. However, their new pals may be too good to be true.
episodes.title: What a Steal

episodes.synopsis: Emma yearns to get her license, so Jessie teaches her how to drive. Victory is elusive when Ravi and Luke accidentally break one of Zuri's games.
episodes.title: Driving Miss Crazy

episodes.synopsis: Bertram decides he's had enough and quits to go work for Mrs. Chesterfield. The Ross family's new butler drives everyone crazy.
episodes.title: Bye Bye Bertie

episodes.synopsis: On vacation, the family finds a beautiful girl with a tail stranded in the ocean. Bertram babysits Mrs. Kipling, who has separation anxiety over Ravi.
episodes.title: Rossed at Sea: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: On a tour of an Italian island, a guide recognizes Jessie's necklace and proclaims that it carries a curse that brings back luck in romance.
episodes.title: Rossed at Sea: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Fighting among the kids pushes Jessie to end their vacation. The next morning, they find their yacht in the middle of the sea with no captain or crew.
episodes.title: Rossed at Sea: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: As the school dance approaches, the Ross family goes all out to get dates. Jessie helps Bertram prepare for his first solo at the Metropolitan Opera.
episodes.title: Dance, Dance Resolution

episodes.synopsis: Bertram buys a new toupee for his band's big performance, but it goes missing, forcing Jessie to interrogate each of the kids.
episodes.title: Someone Has Tou-pay

episodes.synopsis: When Luke becomes the brain of the family and Zuri the new trendy fashionista, Ravi and Emma feel their identities have been stolen.
episodes.title: Identity Thieves

episodes.synopsis: When Mrs. Kipling becomes a national celebrity, it affects her relationship with Ravi. Bertram helps Emma get ready for an audition.
episodes.title: Katch Kipling

episodes.synopsis: While trick-or-treating, Stuart scares the kids with a tale about a ghost. Jessie meets a mysterious masked boy. Bertram feuds with a candy thief.
episodes.title: The Ghostess with the Mostest

episodes.synopsis: Jessie has to relearn all the "special skills" she listed on her resume for a commercial. Ravi convinces Luke that a meteor is headed toward Earth.
episodes.title: The Fear in Our Stars

episodes.synopsis: When Mom comes home, Jessie heads to L.A. for a role in a movie. But when the kids realize that they still need her, they follow her to Hollywood.
episodes.title: Jessie Goes to Hollywood
